thread.title: BRIEF-Green Bancorp Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Green Bancorp Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-green bancorp announces pricing of secondary public offering of common stock february
public offering of common stock reuters

text:
February 1, 2018 / 2:25 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Green Bancorp Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Green Bancorp Inc: 
* GREEN BANCORP, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * SAYS PUBLIC OFFERING PRICED AT $23.25PER SHARE 
* PRICING OF A PUBLIC OFFERING BY CERTAIN SELLING SHAREHOLDERS OF 3 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
